attributes.action: Support our local nursery and oppose the proposed cuts to free funding.
attributes.background: The Leyland nursery has been informed they will loose the funding of free child places following the recent Ofsted report. We are looking for support to reverse this decision so that our nursery can remain open and continue to provide funded and private childcare places.

rejection.details:
This decision seems to be the result of the policy of the Lancashire Schools Forum, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could try starting a petition to Lancashire County Council about this issue:

http://www3.lancashire.gov.uk/corporate/web/?Petitions/32182
